page.title: 19A DAY AT PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: A normal school day starts at five to nine when the bell goes and we come in off the playground. When we get into school we get our books out and go into assembly. Assembly is when the classes meet in the hall for a hymn,a story and a prayer. After this we go back to our classroom to work. In lesson time we do Maths,English and Reading. We have short breaks in the morning and afternoon when we can play outside on the playground or on the grass if it is fine. We have one hour for dinner time. Some of us have school dinners,others bring sandwiches from home. At twenty past three,the bell rings for the end of school. After school we sometimes have clubs for activities like athletics. We use our hall for physical education as well as assemblies. Our school is called Broadstone Hall Primary.
